CONCLUSION: Remainder inadmissible;Violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of P1-1;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in the village of GPE , the GPE region , GPE .
CARDINAL . The applicant is an employee of ORG ( hereinafter - FAC ) . On DATE he suffered an industrial injury .
CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant instituted proceedings in ORG against the ORG seeking compensation for the injury . On DATE the court found in part for the applicant .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG of ORG allowed the protest lodged by the Deputy President of ORG and quashed the decision of DATE . The case was remitted for a fresh consideration to ORG .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG found that the applicant had been injured due to the fault of FAC and ordered it to pay him UAH CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL in compensation and UAH CARDINAL of costs and expenses ( рішення Вугледарського міського суду PERSON області ) . The court also awarded the applicant a DATE allowance of UAH CARDINAL.CARDINAL in compensation for loss of earnings for DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG instituted enforcement proceedings in respect of the judgment of DATE .

CARDINAL . According to the Government , the judgment was fully enforced in instalments : during the periods of DATE and DATE the applicant received a total of UAH CARDINAL , and in DATE he received the remaining amount of the judgment debt ( UAH CARDINAL ) . The last payment took place in DATE . The applicant was also paid UAH CARDINAL for his legal expenses .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG terminated the enforcement proceedings as the judgment of DATE was enforced in full . The applicant never challenged the Bailiffs ' decisions of DATE . Nevertheless , he maintains that the debtor still owes him UAH CARDINAL .

CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the applicant lodged a new claim with ORG of Donetsk against ORG ” ( NORP підприємство „ Донецька вугільна енергетична компанія ” ) , seeking compensation for the substantial delay in the enforcement of the judgment of DATE . Within the course of the proceedings the court appointed a forensic accounting expertise to calculate the amount of compensation due to the applicant . In their conclusions of DATE the experts mentioned , inter alia , that , out of the total amount of the judgment award , UAH CARDINAL remained unpaid .

CARDINAL . On DATE the court partly allowed the applicant 's claim as , according to the domestic legislation then in force , untimely paid salary had to be recalculated if a price index had increased for CARDINAL % during the relevant period of delay in payment . The court also found that the applicant had sustained moral damage as the result of the lengthy non - enforcement of the judgment in his favour . The court awarded the applicant the total of UAH CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL , including ORG CARDINAL in compensation for moral damage .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of Donetsk instituted enforcement proceedings in respect of the judgment of DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the enforcement proceedings were terminated in accordance with the PERSON of GPE “ On measures to ensure the stable operation of fuel and energy sector enterprises ” ( ORG заходи , спрямовані на забезпечення сталого функціонування підприємств паливно-енергетичного комплексу ORG ) .
CARDINAL . The judgment of DATE remained unenforced .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) .
